Class itml.agents.AgentTerminator

java.lang.Object
  itml.agents.Agent
      itml.agents.AgentTerminator

public class itml.agents.AgentTerminator
extends itml.agents.Agent

Example agent: This agent is very aggressive, runs directly towards the opponent and once the opponent is in range attacks.

Method Detail

startGame

public void startGame(int noThisAgent,
                      itml.simulator.StateBattle stateBattle)
Description copied from class: itml.agents.Agent
Start a new game. Do any book keeping you need to to at the beginning of a game here. The index of your agent in stateBattle is provided; it will stay unchanged through the entire game, however, the state of the battle may change each step.

Specified by:
startGame in class itml.agents.Agent
Parameters:
noThisAgent - The index of the agent in the stateBattle state.
stateBattle - The initial battle state.

endGame

public void endGame(itml.simulator.StateBattle stateBattle,
                    double[] results)
Description copied from class: itml.agents.Agent
Game finished. Results is the outcome of the game. entire game, however, the state of the battle may change each step.

Specified by:
endGame in class itml.agents.Agent
Parameters:
stateBattle - The initial battle state.
results - A double array with the game result for each agent (0.0=loss, 0.5=tie, 1.0=win).

act

public itml.cards.Card act(itml.simulator.StateBattle stateBattle)
Description copied from class: itml.agents.Agent
Make your move, by picking a card to play. The index of your agent in stateBattle is provided; it will stay unchanged through the entire game, however, the state of the battle may change each step.

Specified by:
act in class itml.agents.Agent
Parameters:
stateBattle - The current battle (game) state.
Returns:
itml.cards.Card The card to play (action to take).

learn

public weka.classifiers.Classifier learn(weka.core.Instances instances)
Description copied from class: itml.agents.Agent
The agent gets information about past matches of the opponent, and can thus (potentially) learn useful strategies against it for upcoming match. The learning cannot take more than time indicated in the constructor.

Specified by:
learn in class itml.agents.Agent
Parameters:
instances - WEKA instances of past experience. (you can look at file "history.arff" to see attribute formats).
Returns:
A WEKA classifier, which predicts opponent's move in a given situation.
